name: Country Flags
author: Bimal Poudel

sections.description:
Flag icons as served by countryflags.io API by warrigal.studio.

Usable icon size is one of 16, 24, 32, 48, and 64. Default icon size is 16.
253 contry level domains (cld) supported to identify a country.

Usage

  • [flag country=”fr”]
  • [flag country=”fr” size=”16″]

Attribution

Plugin author obtained a permission to link to these resources.
sections.installation: Search and activate the plugin named: “country flags with countryflags.io”.
sections.faq:
What is the source of flag images?

  • See countryflags.io for details.

Does it download country flags images for offline use?

No. Rather it links to the the images to their webiste on realtime.

What are the valid sizes?

Use size=”XX” where XX is one of 16, 24, 32, 48, 64. Units in pixels.

short_description: Insert country flags via a shortcode. Example: [flag country="fr"] inserts corresponding image size.
